Brooklyn Historical Society
Old Crowd of Brooklyn Public School No. 3 reunion collection
Old Crowd of Public School No. 3
1978.118
1.2 Linear Feet in two folders and one volume.
1892-1946 This collection pertains to Brooklyn P.S. 3, located at Hancock Street and Bedford Avenue. One volume contains a listing of the members of the classes of 1892 and 1893 and the reunions they attended. Also included is correspondence between P.S. 3 alumni regarding class reunions during the 1940s, and a scrapbook containing graduation programs, reunion dinner programs, clippings, and group photographs. 1978.118 1 of 1 A0082
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date (if known); Old Crowd of Brooklyn Public School No. 3 reunion collection, 1978.118, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Purchased from Binken's Book Store, 1973.
Conditions Governing Access
Open to users without restriction.
Scope and Contents
This collection pertains to Brooklyn P.S. 3, located at Hancock Street and Bedford Avenue. One volume contains a listing of the members of the classes of 1892 and 1893 and the reunions they attended. Also included is correspondence between P.S. 3 alumni regarding class reunions during the 1940s, and a scrapbook containing graduation programs, reunion dinner programs, clippings, and group photographs.
Conditions Governing Use
While many items at the Center for Brooklyn History are unrestricted, we do not own reproduction rights to all materials. Be aware of the several kinds of rights that might apply: copyright, licensing and trademarks. The researcher assumes all responsibility for copyright questions.
Related Materials
Center for Brooklyn History holds the following related materials:
- Brooklyn schools collection (CBHM.0006)
